attributes.action: make companys pay all invoices within 30 days to prevent smaller companys going bust
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to make it legal that all companys to settle all invoices within a 30 day period and them failing to incur extra 10% in charges per calander month the bill is overdue and to be made law for any claims against companys, this would prevent a lot of companys big and small going to the wall
